description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an AI agent for generating movie scripts, and demonstrates invoking the agent to get a response.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: json_mode_agent
methods.description: An instance of Agent configured to help write movie scripts using a specific AIMLApi model.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method called on json_mode_agent to generate a movie script based on the input 'New York'.
